ideas.title: Melbourne Infrastructure Labyrinth
ideas.premise: A tourist, hopelessly lost in Melbourne's laneways, stumbles upon a sign: 'New Government Infrastructure Project'. The sign points directly into a newly-dug hole filled with orange traffic cones.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at the complexity of Melbourne's roadworks and confusing laneways.

ideas.title: Magpie MVP
ideas.premise: A hyper-aggressive magpie receives the MVP award after single-handedly securing victory for a Melbourne sports team during the championship.
ideas.why_funny: Exaggerated take on the infamous magpie attacks during AFL season.

ideas.title: The 'Melbourne Event' Effect
ideas.premise: A massive crowd attempts to attend a community event, but all are simultaneously trying to take Instagram pictures, creating an impenetrable wall of phones.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable to the modern social media obsession and event crowds.

ideas.title: Flat White Fortune
ideas.premise: A local business announces expansion by opening 20 more boutique coffee shops, each specializing in a slightly different shade of flat white.
ideas.why_funny: Satirizes Melbourne's intense coffee culture and business trends.

ideas.title: Melbourne Weather Roulette
ideas.premise: A weather forecast shows a perfectly sunny day, but every Melbourne resident is dressed in layers, carrying an umbrella, and wearing sunglasses, just in case.
ideas.why_funny: Acknowledges Melbourne's famously unpredictable weather patterns.

headlines.title: Local government discusses new infrastructure project in Melbourne
headlines.summary: City council meets to discuss improvements

headlines.title: Melbourne sports team advances in regional championship
headlines.summary: Recent victory keeps hopes alive for title

headlines.title: Community event draws large crowds to Melbourne center
Local business expansion announced in Melbourne
headlines.summary: New jobs coming to the area

headlines.title: Melbourne weather forecast: Clear skies ahead
